{
  TQUEUE_Entry *entry = (TQUEUE_Entry *) malloc( sizeof(TQUEUE_Entry) );
  if (!entry) {
    return -1;
  }
  entry->entry = data;
  DLIST_push_front( lst, (DLIST_entry *) entry );
  return 0;
}
